Retrieve a specific Review.

Partial responses and Pagination are also supported.

Example

Returns the review with id 1.

curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X GET -d https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/reviews/1.json

PAYLOAD

{ "review": { "id": 1, "type": "VenueReview", "createdAt": "2015-06-04T15:45:46", "updatedAt": "2015-06-04T15:45:46", "targetId": 221, "userId": 1829, "title": "Awesome Place to party!!", "positiveComments": "The environment is awesome!", "negativeComments": "Hard to enter!", "scores": { "pricing": 10, "location": 0, "atmosphere": 5, "safety": 1, "service": 10, "musicAndLineup": 10 }, "_links": { "target": "https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/reviews/1/target.json", "user": "https://bifrost.clubjudge.com/v2/reviews/1/user.json" } } }

NOTE: The token parameter is optional and will be used to retrieve user data.
